meanings.sent1: She is recertifying her first aid training next week.
meanings.sent2: The company requires all employees to recertify their skills annually.
meanings.sent3: After forgetting how to perform CPR, he realized he needed recertifying.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to recertifying her qualifications is admirable.
meanings.sent5: Recertifying her expertise ensures she stays up-to-date in her field.

meanings.sent1: The nurse is recertifying her license to continue practicing.
meanings.sent2: It is essential to recertify your passport before it expires.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he would need to recertify his cooking skills after burning dinner.
meanings.sent4: Renewing and recertifying his membership brought him a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent5: Recertifying his commitment to excellence, he enrolled in advanced courses.
